page.title: 10TIFFANY'S SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday I go to church at 9.45 and go into Sunday school,and learn things about God.At 10.50 we go into church and get blessed.When we get back home we can smell the lovely aroma of roast chicken,and potatos.At 12.30 we all sit down and eat our{scrumptious {lunch,}we finish it off with ice cream and apple pie.In the afternoon we go down to the woods with our dog.Then after that we go on a bike ride down Arnold, and look at all the windows of the{clothes}shops.We go to a{sweet shop and get something to eat,we go and eat our grub in our favourite place.When we get home we watch a{T.V program called'Murder she wrote.' After that we go up to our rooms and sort out our school clothes.Then we go to bed.
